            :degree (f / further)))

comment: However, serious cases should be investigated, such as a report about a two-year-old girl who was hospitalized for days, and then received a second dose of the experimental Pfizer mRNA shot on February , and had a serious adverse reaction on March .
amr:

      :ARG2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (ii / investigate-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / case-04
                        :ARG1-of (s / serious-02)
                        :example (r2 / report-01
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (h / hospitalize-01
                                          :ARG1 (g / girl
                                                :age (t / temporal-quantity
                                                      :quant 2
                                                      :unit (y / year)))
                                          :duration (m / multiple
                                                :op1 t
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (d / day))))
                              :op2 (r3 / receive-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / dose-01
                                          :ARG1 g
                                          :ARG2 (p / product
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "Pfizer"
                                                      :op2 " mRNA")
                                                :ARG1-of (e / experiment-01)
                                                :ARG1-of (s2 / shoot-01
                                                      :time (d3 / date-entity
                                                            :month 2)))
                                          :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                                :value 2))
                                    :time (t2 / then))
                              :op3 (r4 / react-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :time (d4 / date-entity
                                          :month 3)
                                    :mod (a2 / adverse)
                                    :ARG1-of (s3 / serious-02)))))))

comment: The Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS) is a website run by the CDC and FDA where people can report vaccine reactions, injuries and deaths. A common bias is that anyone can report the problem to the VAERS site.
amr:
# ::snt The Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS) is a website run by the CDC and FDA where people can report vaccine reactions, injuries and deaths. A common bias is that anyone can report the problem to the VAERS site.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / website
            :domain (p / publication
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Vaccine"
                        :op2 "Adverse"
                        :op3 "Event"
                        :op4 "Reporting"
                        :op5 "System"))
            :ARG1-of (r / run-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "CDC"))
                        :op2 (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "FDA"))))
            :location-of (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / report-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person)
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (r3 / react-01
                                    :ARG1 (v / vaccine))
                              :op2 (ii / injure-01)
                              :op3 (d / die-01)))))
      :snt2 (b / bias-01
            :ARG2 (p4 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (r4 / report-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / anyone)
                        :ARG1 (p5 / problem)
                        :ARG2 (s / site
                              :poss p)))
            :mod (c / common)))

comment: Pfizer and Moderna are both running clinical trials for their experimental mRNA shots on children as young as six months old. Johnson & Johnson and AstraZeneca are also using children as guinea pigs.
amr:
# ::snt Pfizer and Moderna are both running clinical trials for their experimental mRNA shots on children as young as six months old. Johnson & Johnson and AstraZeneca are also using children as guinea pigs.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / run-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / company
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Pfizer"))
                  :op2 (c2 / company
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Moderna"))
                  :mod (b / both))
            :ARG1 (t / try-01
                  :ARG1 (s / shoot-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / child)
                        :mod (p / protein
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 " mRNA"))
                        :mod (e / experiment)
                        :prep-on (c4 / child
                              :mod (y / young
                                    :quant (a2 / as-much-as
                                          :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 6
                                                :unit (m2 / month))))))
                  :mod (c5 / clinic)))
      :snt2 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (c6 / company
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Johnson"
                              :op2 "&amp"))
                  :op2 (c7 / company
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "AstraZeneca")))
            :ARG1 (c8 / child)
            :ARG2 (g / guinea-pig)
            :mod (a4 / also)))
